price: Emwe bemeye Imana Allah n’Intumwa yayo bakubahiriza n’amabwirizwa yayo! Nimwaharanira idini ry’Imana Allah ku rugamba, mukagendera n’ingingo z’Igitabu cayo, Izobatabara maze muneshe abansi banyu, Yongere Ibatsimbataze ku rugamba.
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوٓاْ إِن تَنصُرُواْ ٱللَّهَ يَنصُرۡكُمۡ وَيُثَبِّتۡ أَقۡدَامَكُمۡ

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū in tanṣurū al-laha yanṣur'kum wayuthabbit aqdāmakum
